name: axe-webdriverjs-demo
description: How to set up aXe with WebdriverJS for automated testing.

scripts.testall: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/*.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test1: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testLogin.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test2: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testForgotPassword.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test3: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testNewUser.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test4: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testMain.js && echo ok || echo not ok
